info.name: Terminal Theme [ahtanu's mod]
info.description: Based on style 96192 from user 251605 (but with less blue). Includes dark style for pastebin and gist embeds.
info.additionalInfo: Credits: user 102356 for creating the original theme style 64485 user 251605 for creating the modified theme style 96192 Dark Tweets: Enable userscripts (use Greasemonkey, Tampermonkey or NinjaKit) and install the following userscript http://userscripts.org/scripts/show/303644
